segments.text: Julia , will you be my wife ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please , Julia , I have made proposal to you five times . I really want to share the rest of my life with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But I â€™ m not ready for married life yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Julia , I really love you . I hope I can stay with you no matter you are happy or sad in future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your way does touch my heart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to think of it for some time .
segments.speaker: S2
